Invoke.name: Voucher Claim
Invoke.description: To claim a voucher from Voucher Contract.

Blob.name: Account
Blob.description: Account to which the voucher is claimed.

transactionTypes.effects: Claims a voucher from the Voucher Contract.

Payment.name: Create Voucher
Payment.description: Create a voucher for a specific amount.

78753F1802C38D96286ACB9DB2E9CAA2A394ECBE.effects: Creates a voucher and stores the public key in the contract.

SetHook.name: Create Treasury - Balance Locking
SetHook.description: Create a treasury with a limit amount, destination account, and ledger interval.

HookParameters.name: Limit Amount (A)
HookParameters.description: Limit amount of the treasury account.

HookParameters.name: Destination Account (D)
HookParameters.description: Destination account of the treasury account.

HookParameters.name: Ledger Interval (L)
HookParameters.description: Ledger interval before the limit amount is withdrawal.

SetHook.effects: Install treasury hook with limit amount, destination account, and ledger interval.

Invoke.name: Withdraw From Treasury Account

HookParameters.name: Withdraw Amount (W)
HookParameters.description: Withdraw amount from the treasury account.

Invoke.effects: Withdraw from the treasury account to the destination account(Set In HookParameter).

SetHook.name: Create Treasury - for ClaimReward
SetHook.description: Create a treasury with the ability to claim rewards.

HookParameters.name: Destination Account (D)
HookParameters.description: Destination account of the treasury account.

SetHook.effects: Install treasury hook and enable rewards claiming to destination account(HookParameter).

Invoke.name: Claim Reward (C)
Invoke.description: Claim reward from the treasury account.

HookParameters.name: Claim Reward (C)
HookParameters.description: Claim reward from the treasury account.

Invoke.effects: Claim reward from the treasury account and forward to the destination account(Set In HookParameter).
